text: "Back in Black" is a 1980 song by Australian hard rock band AC/DC. It was taken from their seventh studio album of the same name. It went to number 37 in the United States in 1981 and number 27 in the United Kingdom and number 65 in Australia and South Korea in 2012. It pays tribute to Bon Scott. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal songs
title: Back in Black (song)
